item.title: Using Python in SaltStack reactor
item.description: Sometimes you need to do some complex actions in a Salt Reactor in which case Python comes in handy. The documentation is not very clear on how to write Python states. The main point is that Salt expects a structure that can be compiled to a Python dictionary. The run() function has to return a dictionary which resembles the state you would write with YAML.
